title: Arch Linux Repos Finally Join The 21st Century
description:
It's easy to forget just how old Arch Linux really is and because of that some of design choices need to be updated from time to time, soon a big change is happening, migrating the old SVN repos over to everyone's favourite Git with Gitlab
